name: AMBER Alert Europe rss alerts
author: Peter Braun

sections.description:
Easy to use AMBER Alert Europe. Displays AMBER Alerts Europe with photo’s .

thanks to

Nischal Maniar
Stuart of Cazue.com

Thanks to

http://www.amberalert.eu/

Nischal Maniar ( for the plugin hook )

Donate

Promote www.spep.nl ? ( we are a non profit open stage for artist ( without subsidies ) in Landgraaf in Netherlands)
But if you want to donate some mony, email us for the bank accound number.

sections.installation:
1) Unzip the plugin in your plugins folder and activate the plugin

2) In the settings section,you can enter of numbers of messages ( 1 to 15 ),

if you want a to display the photo or not ,

and coordinates displayed or not.

and a simple chache ( time can be set )

3) Creating a AMBER Alert Europe page is easy, just add a new Page through your wordpress admin and add following line in that page. [amber]

4) That’s it ! Enjoy !
sections.faq:
use php>5.2 and file_get_contents must be enabled !

the pictures are hosted bij amberalert them self !!
sections.changelog:

1.00 first release
